CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: This coincides with the relative HOMO energy levels of the polymers.

Let's think step by step.

1. HOMO: Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital
2. Polymers: Materials made up of long chains of repeating units.

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are "polymers".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: This coincides with the relative HOMO energy levels of the polymers.

Let's think step by step.

1. HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital) energy levels
2. Polymers

In this paragraph, "HOMO energy levels of the polymers" refers to the energy levels of the highest occupied molecular orbitals in the polymers. Therefore, "HOMO energy levels" and "energy levels of the polymers" can be considered as the property values in this context.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. HOMO energy levels
2. energy levels (implied to be material properties, specifically related to polymers)

So, the relevant property values in the paragraph are the HOMO energy levels and the energy levels of the polymers.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| HOMO energy levels |
| energy levels of the polymers |

These property values refer to the energy levels of the Highest Occupied Molecular Orbitals (HOMO) specifically for polymers.
